title: The Expanse authors Daniel Abraham and Ty Franck (Part 1: No Spoilers)
description:
Sign up for CuriosityStream and Nebula for $15/year: https://curiositystream.com/asxpod

This episode has no spoilers for The Expanse.

Part 2 with spoilers here: https://art19.com/shows/alt-shift-x-podcast/episodes/82e0d08c-c02f-44bb-80e0-9b43f5891361

0:00 Intro

1:47 Finishing The Expanse

3:37 Future projects, fantasy, horror

11:14 Internet culture & criticism

19:57 Writing The Expanse, TV

39:27 Next sci fi trilogy

48:28 Editing, revisiting work

52:31 Game of Thrones Season 8, endings

54:04 Revisiting, perfecting work

58:08 Expanse book titles, novella collection title

1:01:32 George R. R. Martin's Expanse character

1:04:04 The Expanse beyond Season 6

YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ER_lohK_i8

Alt Shift X Expanse videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLn6yDpEottdiQe66hGsUa8o4CIDjCanyW

Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/77vubQGd6CsuespWT2Wqa0
